title: THNN unnecessary .zero() calls on gradients
body_html:
THNN convolutions are slower due to unnecessary .zero() calls on gradients:

  • https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/_functions/conv.py#L227 is not needed
  • https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/_functions/conv.py#L239 same for bias, prob worth adding a constant in C-side that controls whether to override grad or not

body:
THNN convolutions are slower due to unnecessary .zero() calls on gradients:
* https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/_functions/conv.py#L227 is not needed
* https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/_functions/conv.py#L239 same for bias, prob worth adding a constant in C-side that controls whether to override grad or not
